00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "NodeSet.hpp"
00035 #include <iostream>
00036 
00037 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00038 
00039 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& s, NodeSet set )
00040 {
00041   unsigned i;
00042   s << '{';
00043   for (i = 0; i < NodeSet::NUM_CORNER_BITS; ++i)
00044     s << (set.corner_node(i) ? '1' : '0');
00045   s << ' ';
00046   for (i = 0; i < NodeSet::NUM_EDGE_BITS; ++i)
00047     s << (set.mid_edge_node(i) ? '1' : '0');
00048   s << ' ';
00049   for (i = 0; i < NodeSet::NUM_FACE_BITS; ++i)
00050     s << (set.mid_face_node(i) ? '1' : '0');
00051   s << ' ';
00052   for (i = 0; i < NodeSet::NUM_REGION_BITS; ++i)
00053     s << (set.mid_region_node(i) ? '1' : '0');
00054   s << '}';
00055   return s;
00056 }
